feed.title: AliasVault Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

This is a bugfix release that fixes a admin password generation bug in install.sh that occured during clean installs.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Admin password hash method in installcli does not pass required arguments by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/511

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.10.0...0.10.1

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

This bugfix release fixes an issue with the Postgres migration that caused the task runner background service to not run reliably.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Maintenance tasks do not run after migration to PostgreSQL by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/513

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.10.1...0.10.2

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.10.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

This hotfix release makes the AliasVault Docker images and install process compatible with native arm64 based devices such as a Raspberry Pi.

üöÄ New Features

  • Add support for arm64 to docker images and install.sh local build by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/517

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.10.2...0.10.3

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release adds support for receiving and opening email attachments in the AliasVault client (up to 10 MB). Also fixes a few minor bugs and stability improvements.

üöÄ New Features

  • Add email attachment support by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/524
  • Make duplicate email warning log more readable by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/536

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fix typo in UserEmailClaim.cs by @eltociear in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/521
  • Update GitHub actions tests to support PRs from forks by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/523
  • Prevent email address collision from occurring during identity generation by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/527
  • Update sonarcloud-code-analysis.yml to work with PR's from forks by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/531

üß© Dependencies Updates

  • Bump coverlet.collector from 6.0.2 to 6.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/519
  • Bump coverlet.msbuild from 6.0.2 to 6.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/518
  • Bump NUnit.Analyzers from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/528

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/521

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.10.3...0.11.0

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

This hotfix release fixes a few UI bugs, simplifies the self-host installation process and updates dependencies.

üöÄ New Features

  • Add GitHub issue templates by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/540
  • Simplify installation by using relative url for API instead of requiring hostname in env file by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/556

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Update mobile menu position in client and admin by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/554

üß© Dependencies Updates

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer, Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens and Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/543
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection from 9.0.0 to 9.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/544
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization and Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/545
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFrameworkCore from 9.0.0 to 9.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/546
  • Bump coverlet.collector from 6.0.3 to 6.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/547
  • Bump Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration and Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/548
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing from 9.0.0 to 9.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/550
  • Bump Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens and Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/549
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer from 9.0.0 to 9.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/552

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.11.0...0.11.1
